channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: Save over $100 on this portable personal air conditioner
item.description: The EvaSMART 2 is a compact portable AC unit that doubles as an air purifier and humidifier.

item.title: Sigma fp L hands-on: Tiny camera, big sensor, enormous compromises
item.description: Sigma has crammed a 61-megapixel full-frame sensor into the tiny fp L body, but that has meant some big compromises to handling and performance.

item.title: Xiaomi says it can fully charge a phone in eight minutes
item.description: Xiaomi has demonstrated its new Hyper Charge tech fully charging a 4,000mAH phone battery in eight minutes.

item.title: The best 60-percent keyboards you can buy
item.description: Here's a list of the best 60-percent keyboards you can buy, as chosen by Engadget editors.

item.title: The Morning After: A surprising cloudy day on Mars
item.description: Today’s headlines: The first look at a cloudy day on Mars, Apple delays paid podcast subscription launch to June and Tesla may have to ship Texas-made EVs out of state to sell them to Texans.

item.title: Google says it won't build Privacy Sandbox backdoors
item.description: Google has said it will not bypass the Privacy Sandbox rules it plans to impose next year in order to end third-party cookie tracking.

item.title: Android 12 will force apps through the official share menu
item.description: With Android 12, Google will stop third-party apps from replacing the stock share dialog.

item.title: Intel's latest 11th-gen CPU lets ultraportables hit 5GHz
item.description: Thin and light computers will finally cross the 5GHz barrier with Intel's latest flagship 11th-gen U-series chip.

item.title: The best dark matter map to date raises questions about the universe
item.description: Scientists have released the most precise map of dark matter to date, but it only serves to highlight mysteries in the universe.

item.title: Curiosity rover offers a rare glimpse of cloudy days on Mars
item.description: NASA's Curiosity rover has offered a rare peek at clouds on Mars, and they've already led to a discovery.

item.title: Instagram will surface more reshared posts amid Palestinian censorship claims
item.description: Instagram is changing its algorithm to rank reshared posts more fairly amid Palestinian claims it was censoring content.

item.title: Japan will send a transforming robot ball to the Moon
item.description: Japan plans to explore the Moon with a transforming ball robot made with the help of Sony and Tomy.

item.title: Tesla may have to ship Texas-made EVs out of state to sell them to Texans
item.description: Tesla may have to ship EVs made in Texas out of the state to sell them to local customers due to pro-dealership laws that haven't been changed.

item.title: This 4K drone for videographers is on sale for $99 right now
item.description: The Global Drone 4K Platinum Version is a great mid-range quadcopter that offers total control using a remote controller or your own phone.

item.title: Google reportedly made it harder to find Android privacy settings
item.description: Google reportedly made it harder to find Android privacy settings and even pressured phone makers into hiding settings.

item.title: New AI supercomputer will help create the largest-ever 3D map of the universe
item.description: A new AI supercomputer, Perlmutter, is powerful enough that it will be used to help make the largest-ever 3D map of the universe.

item.title: Apple delays paid podcast subscription launch to June
item.description: Apple has announced that paid podcast subscriptions won't be available until June.

item.title: Ford's electric F-150 range estimates are very conservative
item.description: Ford has revealed that its F-150 Lightning range estimates assume you're carrying heavy cargo — real-world figures may be considerably higher.

item.title: Anker charging accessories are discounted today only in an Amazon sale
item.description: Anker's power cables, adapters and wireless charging stands are steeply discounted as part of a one-day Amazon sale.

item.title: WhatsApp won't limit accounts for users who don't accept its new privacy policy
item.description: WhatsApp won't be limiting features you can access if you don't accept its new privacy policy.

item.title: Venmo now lets users hide their friends lists following Biden discovery
item.description: Venmo has started rolling out a change in users' privacy settings that would allow you to hide your friends list.

item.title: Hitting the Books: Sci-fi strategies may be needed to stave off climate change
item.description: Stockholm Resilience Centre researchers Owen Gaffney and Johan Rockström walk readers through the scale of environmental challenges we currently face, explore the concept of "planetary stewardship," and discuss what we might have to do if what we're doing doesn't work.

item.title: Tesla delays Model S Plaid deliveries to June 10th for a 'tweak'
item.description: Tesla is delaying the delivery of its Model S Plaid to June 10th for a last-minute 'tweak.'

item.title: These noise-canceling headphones are $72 for this week only
item.description: The TREBLAB Z2 headphones offer excellent sound quality, active noise cancelation and long battery life.

item.title: The Morning After: Apple finally fixed the Apple TV 4K remote
item.description: Check out our review of the new Apple TV and its Siri Remote, plus the best tech deals for Memorial Day weekend.
